mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NAME,DEPARTMENT_NAME,M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_IMAGE_FILE_ROUTE, M.FILE_EXTENSION FROM PROJECT_ATTEND PA JOIN ASSOCIATION A ON PA.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID AND PA.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN ORGCHART O ON O.ORGCHART_ID = A.ORGCHART_ID WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_NAME

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORGCHART.*, LEVEL AS LVL FROM ORGCHART START WITH COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND SENIOR_DEPARTMENT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCHART_ID = SENIOR_DEPARTMENT_ID ) WHERE LVL = 2 AND DEPARTMENT_REMOVE_WHETHER IS NULL ORDER BY LVL

SELECT CL.CHATTING_ID, CL.MEMBER_ID, CL.CHATTING_CONNECT_TIME, C.CHATTING_NAME, C.CHATTING_MEM_NAME, S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME, CC.CHATTING_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_IMAGE_FILE_ROUTE, M.FILE_EXTENSION FROM CHATTING_LIST CL JOIN MEMBER M ON CL.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN CHATTING C ON CL.CHATTING_ID = C.CHATTING_ID JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT CHATTING_ID, MAX(chatting_content_time) OVER (PARTITION BY CHATTING_ID) AS CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME FROM CHATTING_CONTENT) S ON CL.CHATTING_ID = S.CHATTING_ID JOIN CHATTING_CONTENT CC ON S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME = CC.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME WHERE CL.CHATTING_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CHATTING_ID FROM CHATTING_LIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND C.CHATTING_WHTHER_GROUP = 'N' ) AND CL.MEMBER_ID != #{memberId} ORDER BY S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME DESC

SELECT CL.CHATTING_ID , CL.MEMBER_ID , CL.CHATTING_CONNECT_TIME , C.CHATTING_NAME , S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME , CC.CHATTING_CONTENT FROM CHATTING_LIST CL JOIN CHATTING C ON CL.CHATTING_ID = C.CHATTING_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT CHATTING_ID, max(chatting_content_time)over(PARTITION BY CHATTING_ID) AS CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME FROM CHATTING_CONTENT) S ON CL.CHATTING_ID = S.CHATTING_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CHATTING_CONTENT CC ON S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME = CC.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME WHERE CL.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and C.CHATTING_WHTHER_GROUP = 'Y' ORDER BY S.CHATTING_CONTENT_TIME DESC
